title: my game randomly crashing after champ select
body: wtf i thought this was patched

replies.body: I'd like to help out, but need some more information.  Can you clarify crashing a bit more for me?  For example, are you receiving any error messages?  Does the game try and load at all?  Anything would help.  Thanks!
I has not happened again. I had the repair option fix after telling me file were corrupted but thought it failed after the first repair didn't fix it. Second time was the charm I guess.
